title: Key Features
description: Features focused to address your business problems

data.title: Responsive user interface
data.description: Looks great on all your devices. A sleek and clean user interface keeps you away from any distractions. Allow you to choose between light and dark modes based on your personal preference.

data.title: Dynamic filters
data.description: Filters that allow you to focus on the topics that are relevant for you at the moment. Create custom filters and choose to publish it to the team.

data.title: Checklist to track a task
data.description: Logically group tasks with the power of custom checklist groups against a task. Choose between story points or time estimates to plan and track project deliverables. Create your workflow unique for each project.
